Saves project, i.e. includes contents of all records into a single record.

Returns:
true if saved successfully, false otherwise

saveAsync

public void saveAsync(SEProject.SaveProjectStatusListener listener)
Saves project async, see save(). An interested in an operation's status part should implement the SEProject.SaveProjectStatusListener interface.

Parameters:
listener - an interested in a current operation's status part
